pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sustainable Transport Planning // Tools for transport planning with an emphasis on spatial transport data and non-motorized modes. Enables common transport planning tasks including: downloading and cleaning transport datasets; creating geographic "desire lines" from origin-destination (OD) data; route assignment, locally and via interfaces to routing services such as http://cyclestreets.net/; calculation of route segment attributes such as bearing and aggregate flow; and 'travel watershed' analysis. See Lovelace and Ellison (2018) doi:10.32614/RJ-2018-053.
